name: Goliath Depot
storyline: Founded in the 1970's, the Goliath Corporation is a store chain owned by an evil maniac. On a winter storm night in 1985, George notices during his night shift that mysterious blue doors appeared all over the Goliath complex spawning evil products everywhere. Quickly, he tries to close them all and seal them away. The unlikely hero must alert the CEO at the Head Quarter. Can he do it before it's too late?
summary: Goliath Depot is a door-slamming 2D arcade platformer taken straight from the early 80's. Close all doors, kick the enemies and rack up a high score in 6 different worlds. Are you good enough to lift the curse of the Goliath Depot?
